title: Katie Price lives in a one-room annexe as her mansion is renovated
text:
Katie Price has been forced to live in a one-room annexe adjacent to her country home after ongoing building work made the dilapidated property 'unlivable.'

The former glamour model is currently renovating her nine-bedroom Sussex home after facing a barrage of criticism for its shabby condition.

But while building contractors gut the property, mother of five Katie, 41, has relocated to a modest outbuilding originally intended for oldest child Harvey, The Sun reports.

Downsizing: Katie Price has been forced to live in a one-room annexe adjacent to her country home after ongoing building work made the dilapidated property 'unlivable'

'Work on Katie’s house has now gone on so long, she can’t really live in it at all,' an insider told the publication.

'It’s all been ripped out and nothing works. It’s a building site – piles of rubbish and dust everywhere... she’s hoping to move back into the house before Christmas but work has ground to a halt, really.'

It's understood that her home interiors have been completely stripped out, leaving bare brick walls and floorboards while builders continue their renovation work.

Under construction: The former glamour model is currently renovating her nine-bedroom Sussex home after facing a barrage of criticism for its shabby condition

Under construction: The former glamour model is currently renovating her nine-bedroom Sussex home after facing a barrage of criticism for its shabby condition

Change: While building contractors gut the property, mother of five Katie, 41, has relocated to a modest outbuilding originally intended for oldest child Harvey

Katie had previously admitted to living in the outhouse while giving fans a guided tour of the rubbish strewn grounds surrounding her £2million home in a recent YouTube video.

'I'm having my new house built and while they're doing that I'm living in my annexe,' she explained.

The former model had set out to disprove rumours that her house was in disarray, but after revealing piles of garbage in her horse yard she was forced to concede: 'Yes, it does look like a mucky mansion.'

Admission: Katie had previously admitted to living in the outhouse while giving fans a guided tour of the rubbish strewn grounds surrounding her £2million home

Awkward: The former model had set out to disprove rumours that her house was in disarray, but after revealing piles of garbage in her horse yard she was forced to concede it needed work

Swim free zone: Katie then took the camera to her pool area, which was previously described as a 'swamp' by Keith Lemon on Through The Keyhole

Katie then took the camera to her pool area, which was previously described as a 'swamp' by Keith Lemon on Through The Keyhole, along with her dog Blade.

The pool has since been drained and fenced off so that her five children are unable to access it, due to the fact it is currently overgrown and filled with green, scum coated water.

Katie said: 'This is my swimming pool at the moment. I think it looks a bit better than a swamp. Obviously I've fenced it all off so the kids don't get in there.'

Play area: Overgrown weeds surrounded a pile of abandoned wooden trestles, scaffolding and children's playthings in another clip from her recent video

Not true: During the clip, Katie also refuted claims that she will be forced to give up her home as she is due back in court over bankruptcy repayments

During the clip, Katie also refuted claims that she will be forced to give up her home as she is due back in court over bankruptcy repayments.

Katie will appear at a specialist insolvency and companies court in Central London on October 14 and will find out if she will get to keep her 'mucky mansion', The Sun reports.

She avoided bankruptcy last year after coming to an agreement over a £22,000 tax bill.

Her mansion, a former home of politician Francis Maude, boasts nine bedrooms, a two bedroom annex, 12 acres of land, a pool, tennis court and stables.

MailOnline has contacted a representative for further comment.
description: The former glamour model is currently renovating her nine-bedroom Sussex home after facing a barrage of criticism for its shabby condition.
